entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

text: @realDonaldTrump I will be blunt. You are a stupid, selfish piece of shit!! If you think this is a smart move, I expect you to volunteer in NYC hospitals and work directly with Covid-19 patients because they will need all the help they can get you fucking twat!!!
